question: List user names and product names.
column3: orders.product FROM users JOIN orders ON users.id = orders.user_id;

question: List names of users who ordered a Pen.
expectedQuery: SELECT name FROM users JOIN orders ON users.id = orders.user_id WHERE product = 'Pen';

question: List all users and their total amount spent.
column3: SUM(orders.amount) FROM users JOIN orders ON users.id = orders.user_id GROUP BY users.name;
